---
title: "Linked D3 Scatter Plots"
output: html_document
---

This is a demonstration of the linked D3 scatterplot htmlwidget.

```{r}
library(linkedscatter)
npoints <- 10
dat <- data.frame(mpg=rnorm(npoints),
                  weight=runif(npoints),
                  horsepower=runif(npoints) + 20,
                  name=paste("point_",letters[1:10],sep=""))
```

```{r firstPlot}
linkedscatter(dat, x='weight', y='mpg', tooltip='name', linked=TRUE)
```

```{r secondPlot}
linkedscatter(dat, x='horsepower', y='mpg', tooltip='name', linked=TRUE)
```
